uh 2006 i came back from italy

i said i'm gonna make my own so what i
do is i put my hands in the bowl with
the ice water
and then i put my hands in the bowl with

that kind of like keeps your hand
protected
yeah your hand a little bit so when i

i remove it from the bowl and i put it

if i'm wearing gloves it takes like a

this cheese has been sitting those curds

fresh mozzarella cheese but what i
learned was
this cheese
is never as good as when it's first made

warm and seepy in the middle and so when
i first started making this i would
taste it in the kitchen and i would say
man mozzarella cheese made 30 seconds
ago is like one of the great things that

30 seconds after it's made i don't get

we're going to start making mozzarella
